common.agreeTerms: By clicking continue, you agree to our
common.agreeTermsRegister: By creating an account, you agree to our
common.needHelp: Need help getting started? Check out our
common.emailNotVerifiedDescription: Please verify your email address before logging in.

home.title: {{platformName}} Account
home.description: Sign in to your account or create a new one to access all {{platformName}} features
home.saveChanges: Save and see your changes instantly.

register.title: Create your {{platformName}} Account
register.description: Sign up to get started with {{appName}}

emailConfirmation.title: Check your email
emailConfirmation.description: We've sent you a confirmation link
emailConfirmation.checkEmail: Please check your email and click the confirmation link to activate your account.

emailConfirmed.title: Email confirmed
emailConfirmed.description: Your email has been successfully confirmed
emailConfirmed.successMessage: Thank you for confirming your email address. You can now log in to your account.

emailConfirmationFailed.title: Email confirmation failed
emailConfirmationFailed.description: There was a problem confirming your email
emailConfirmationFailed.errorMessage: The confirmation link may have expired or is invalid. Please try registering again.

terms.title: Terms and Conditions
terms.description: Please read our terms and conditions carefully

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.description: Learn how we protect your privacy and handle your data

consent.title: Application Authorization
consent.description: An application is requesting access to your account
consent.applicationRequesting: is requesting access to your {{platformName}} account
consent.thisWillAllow: This will allow the application to:

scopeDescriptions.offline_access: Maintain access when you're not present
scopeDescriptions.roles: Access your role information (e.g., admin, user) to determine your permissions in the application

consent.missingConsentCode: Missing consent code. Please try again.

account.title: Account Dashboard
account.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 8 characters
account.name: Name
account.totalLoginsDescription: Total number of times you've logged in
account.connectedAppsDescription: Applications with access to your account
account.apiKeysDescription: API keys for accessing your account
account.updatePersonalInfo: Update your personal information and account details
account.emailCannotChange: Email cannot be changed. Contact support if you need to update your email address.

apiKeysPage.title: API keys
apiKeysPage.description: Create and manage API keys for programmatic access to your {{platformName}} account.
apiKeysPage.listDescription: Generate keys for services and revoke them when they are no longer needed.
apiKeysPage.emptyDescription: Generate an API key to authenticate your external integrations.
apiKeysPage.createDialogDescription: Name your key so you can remember where it is used. You can revoke it at any time.
apiKeysPage.expirationHelp: After this number of days the key stops working automatically.
apiKeysPage.invalidExpiration: Please enter a positive number of days.
apiKeysPage.deleteDescription: This key will stop working immediately. This action cannot be undone.
apiKeysPage.generatedDescription: Copy and store the full key now. It will only be shown once.
apiKeysPage.generatedWarning: Keep this key secret. Anyone with the key can act as your integration.
apiKeysPage.genericError: Something went wrong. Please try again.
apiKeysPage.manageNoteDescription: Rotate API keys regularly and delete any that are no longer used.

logout.title: Logged Out
logout.description: You have been successfully logged out
logout.loggedOutSuccessfully: You have been successfully logged out of your account.
logout.loggedOutUnsuccessfully: There was a problem logging you out. Please try again.

forgotPassword.title: Reset your password
forgotPassword.description: Enter your email address and we'll send you a link to reset your password
forgotPassword.successMessage: If an account exists with that email, we've sent you a password reset link.

resetPassword.title: Reset your password
resetPassword.successMessage: Your password has been successfully reset. You can now log in with your new password.
